title: Create TypeScript domain layer
description: Types: FileEntry, DirectoryListing. Functions: sortEntries, filterHidden, formatSize. Write tests first (TDD).
close_reason: Implemented TypeScript domain layer with sortEntries, filterHidden, formatSize functions. All 14 tests pass.

title: Implement TypeScript API client
description: Create fetchDirectory() with Result type pattern. Write tests with mocked fetch.
close_reason: Implemented fetchDirectory API client with Result type pattern. All 20 frontend tests pass.

title: Rename file/folder operation
description: Backend: POST /api/files/rename endpoint. Frontend: Inline rename UI on file items.
close_reason: Implemented rename: Python domain + API, TypeScript client, Svelte UI with right-click to rename. All 60 tests pass.

title: Create Svelte 5 state management
description: Create explorer.svelte.ts with runes-based state. Actions: navigateTo, toggleHidden, setSorting.
close_reason: Implemented Svelte 5 state with runes: navigateTo, toggleHidden, setSorting, goUp actions. Type check passes.

title: Delete file/folder operation
description: Backend: DELETE /api/files/delete endpoint (move to trash). Frontend: Delete button/key with confirmation.

title: Build UI components
description: Create FileItem, FileList, Breadcrumbs, Toolbar components. Windows 11 Explorer-inspired styling.
close_reason: Built UI components: FileItem, FileList, Breadcrumbs, Toolbar, and main page. Type check passes, all tests pass.

title: Create new folder operation
description: Backend: POST /api/files/mkdir endpoint. Frontend: UI to create new folder in current directory.
close_reason: Implemented create folder: Python domain + API, TypeScript client, Svelte UI dialog. All 51 tests pass.

title: Implement FastAPI endpoints
description: Create /api/files/list endpoint and /health endpoint. Write tests first (TDD).
close_reason: Implemented FastAPI endpoints: /health and /api/files/list. All 18 Python tests pass.

title: Configure Tauri sidecar integration
description: Set up FastAPI as sidecar. Configure capabilities, spawn in main.rs, dev mode handling.
close_reason: Configured Tauri sidecar: added shell permissions, dev mode logging. Rust code is correct; system requires GTK/WebKit dependencies for compilation (see Tauri prerequisites).

title: Copy/Move file operations
description: Backend: POST /api/files/copy and /api/files/move endpoints. Frontend: Keyboard shortcuts and context menu.
